\subsection{Detailed Description}
A generic string type for storing Unicode data. T\-O\-D\-O. 

T\-O\-D\-O\-: detailed description

T\-O\-D\-O\-: Non N\-U\-L\-L terminated data

\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{const char $\ast$}]{data}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string_a483e71ec1090e346c63bf2b13b37ad7a}


Assigns the internal data of this \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string}{U\-T\-F8\-String} to the given string literal. 

This operation will delete any current internal data of this object. The input data is expected to be utf-\/8 encoded and N\-U\-L\-L terminated.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em data} & Data buffer to copy from. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string_a861874ab4bff725c9c10b20a14533221}{\index{chaos\-::str\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String@{chaos\-::str\-::\-U\-T\-F8\-String}!assign@{assign}}

Assigns the internal data of this \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string}{U\-T\-F8\-String} to the data buffer. 

This operation will delete any current internal data of this object. The input data is expected to be utf-\/8 encoded and N\-U\-L\-L terminated.

\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
) const}}\label{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string_a848f2364bfff00544463f9f08748cdc2}


Get the length of the internal buffer data in bytes. 

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
This is not equal to the character length of the string as utf-\/8 encoded characters can take up multiple bytes.
\end{DoxyNote}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
The length of the internal data. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

\end{DoxyParamCaption}
) const}}\label{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string_ac7b54ed9c42a9c9a0a386d453d2c1daa}


Less than operator. 

Compares whether this \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string}{U\-T\-F8\-String} is less than the other given \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1str_1_1_u_t_f8_string}{U\-T\-F8\-String}.

Less than is defined by performing a value comparison between each Unicode code point in the string.

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
correct implementation in progress
\end{DoxyWarning}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}

\end{DoxyParams}
